author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

This PR migrates the `TestLegacy*` DQM modules to `edm::one::EDAnalyzer<...>` as part of #36404. I considered first removing them, but then realized there are still `edm::one::EDAnalyzer`s using the `DQMStore` in the legacy way (i.e. via `edm::Service<DQMStore>`), so it is probably better to keep that functionality tested.

#### PR validation:

Unit tests run.
title: Migrate TestLegacy* DQM modules to edm::one::EDAnalyzer
